high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathroom door then turn right.
Look up and open the cupboard and grab the bar of pink soap that's in there before closing the door.
Turn right and walk to the sink.
Get the soap wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Turn right and walk to the wall then turn right and walk to the toilet.
Put the bar of soap in the bottom left corner of the back of the toilet from your perspective.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around, go to the cabinet past the sink on the right.
Take the soap out of the upper cabinet.
Bring the soap to the sink on the right.
Wash the soap in the sink with water.
Bring the soap to the toilet, on the other side of the room from the sink.
Put the washed soap on the toilet tank lid.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed soap on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: walk to face a thin dresser with two boxes of tissues on top
open the cabinet door directly above the thin dresser, take out a bar of soap, close the door
turn right to face the left side of the sink
put the soap in the sink basin, wash the soap, pick up the soap
turn around to face the toilet
put the soap bar on the toilet tank top
tasks.task_desc: put a washed bar of soap on top of the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn to your right and go across the room, to the toilet on your left.
Pick up the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and go to the sink across the room, and to your right.
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, get the rag in the sink soapy, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Turn to your right and go across the room, back to the toilet on your right.
Place the bar of soap back on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean bar of soap on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and walk ahead, veering left to the left side of the toilet.
Pick up the soap on the toilet tank.
Turn around and veer right to the sink.
Rinse the soap in the sink.
Turn around and walk back to the left side of the toilet.
Place the sop on the front left corner of the toilet tank,
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap on a toilet tank.

high_descs: turn right and walk to the left side of the toilet at the end of the room on the left
grab a bar of soap off of the top of the toilet
turn around and walk over to the sink on the right at the end of the room
rinse off the soap inside of the sink
turn around and walk back over to the left side of the toilet
place the bar of soap back on top of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: place a rinsed off bar of soap on the top of the toilet

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the front of the table.
Pick up the bar of soap closest to the back wall.
Turn to the right and move in front of the sink.
Put the soap in the sink to fill it and empty it with water and remove the soap.
Turn to the right and move to the left of the toilet.
Place the bar of soap on the lid of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to the right and find the skinny dresser.
Pick up the bar of soap from the back right corner of the dresser.
Hold the soap and look to the right.
Locate the sink on the left and place the soap inside. Turn on the water and then off again. Pick up the soap.
Carry the soap and turn to the right, and then face the toilet on the right.
Place the soap on the closer side of the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a bar of soap and move it to the toilet.

high_descs: Head to the right, Take the bar of soap from the counter
Head to the right, Put the bar of soap in the sink
Turn on the sink for 3 seconds
Take the bar of soap from the sink
Head to the right
Put the bar of soap on top of the toilet

Turn to the right to face the sink and tub.
Put the towel down in the sink.

Drop the soap into the sink and run some water.

Drop the soap into the the itself.

Put the soap in the bath tub.

Put the bar of soap in the sink and turn on the water, after a couple seconds turn the water off and remove the now clean bar of soap.

Hold the soap and turn around and face the cabinet.

high_descs: Turn right, go forward, then turn right to face the toilet.
Pick up the plunger, to the left of the toilet.
Turn around, move forward, then turn right to face the cabinet.
Put the plunger in the cabinet in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Put the plunger in the cabinet.

high_descs: Go right and then right again and face the plunger on the floor to the left of the toilet.
Pick the plunger up from the floor.
Turn around and face the white cabinet behind.
Put the plunger in the bottom cabinet and shut the door.
tasks.task_desc: Put a plunger in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn around and face the towel hanging to the left of the mirror.
Take the towel down from the towel ring.
Turn and go left to face the tub.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in a tub.

high_descs: Move to the wall to the left of the sink
Pick up the hand towel that is on the towel holder
Carry the hand towel to the bath tub
Place the hand towel inside of the bath tub
tasks.task_desc: Move a hand towel to the bath tub

high_descs: Turn and move to stand in front of the circular towel holder mounted on the wall to the left of the sink.
Remove the towel from the ring.
Carry the towel to the bath tub.
Place the towel in the bath tub between the two wash cloths closest to the drain.
tasks.task_desc: Move a towel to the bath tub.
